answers.answer: I don't have high bp but must definitely have never-ending heartburn. Been this way since first trimester.
I didn't have it at all until my blood pressure went up. Doctor said that's why... If you've had it this whole time I should like bow down to you. You're a trooper.
I'm going through the same thing I have an appt this Tuesday they'll tell me if I'm getting induced I'm 37+3 I'm just scared of developing preeclampsia.
It *****. I been restless my entire pregnancy because of it. & it make me sick. Hopefully everything turns out well for you ladies
I get told Tuesday as well if I get induced or not...
Is that what you want? If so hopefully they go ahead and induce you. Are you dilated any?
Dunno they haven't checked. But yeah. I've had a punched nerve my entire pregnancy..

Ok. That's understandable then. I think I personally would want to be induced too. I wish I could get induced this week instead of next because this pregnancy has been some work. But good luck everything will workout fine

question: I've got never ending heart burn due to my high blood pressure... It suxs so much. They want to induce me because of it and I don't get to find out until Tuesday if they're going to. But its so uncomfortable on top of all the other pregnancy issues that I'm sure you ladies know what they are. Ha. Well! Hopefully Tuesday comes a little faster.
title: stupid heartburn.
